short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract color palettes from any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily capture the colors from any website with a single click!

This extension lets you instantly extract color palettes directly from your favorite sites, making it a powerful tool for designers and developers.

Features:

One-click color extraction – grab colors from any site instantly

Easy export options – export palettes as SVGs to Figma, Illustrator, Photoshop, and more

Copy and paste – quickly transfer color codes into your favorite design tools

No more guessing color codes or tedious manual work. Streamline your workflow and make color inspiration easy, organized, and always within reach!
